name: Slendrina: The basement
description:
Slendrina is back in a new scary game! She has become even more angry than before and hates when someone invades her territory. She will do everything to stop you.

This time you are in an old mysterious basement. The deeper you go, the stranger this place gets. Try to find 6 pieces of the master key to open the fire exit and escape from this terrible place. Whatever happens... don't look back! Good luck

Enjoy this scary game with great graphics. Slendrina: The basement is available on following languages:

  • English
  • Russian
  • French
  •  German 
  • Italiano
  • Spanish
